org.hps.evio

Class HodoEvioReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.evio.EvioReader
      • org.hps.evio.HodoEvioReader

  • public class HodoEvioReader
extends EvioReader
    This class is similar to the ECalEvioReader. It was copied and modified to work with Hodoscope data.

      • makeHits

        public boolean makeHits(org.jlab.coda.jevio.EvioEvent event,
                        EventHeader lcsimEvent)
        Description copied from class: EvioReader
        Make a LCIO hit collection (e.g. RawTrackerHit, CalorimeterHit from raw EVIO data.
        Specified by:
        makeHits in class EvioReader
        Parameters:
        event - : The EVIO event to read the raw data from
        lcsimEvent - : The LCSim event to write the collections to
        Returns:
        True if the appropriate EVIO bank is found, false otherwise

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        If this is called, then a check was already made in the builder for the "hodo_channels" conditions collection. Should either the subdetector or "hodo_channels" collection be missing, then something has gone wrong, and a fatal exception will be thrown.
